entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Halifax
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:27 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Halifax Stanfield Int'l Airport 05:35 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 8.7°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 70 this morning. High 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening and after midnight. Freezing rain beginning after midnight except rain along parts of the coast. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
